grammatical.name: This response sounds fluent and grammatical.

relevency.name: This response is relevant to what you were talking about. It is sensible.

knowledgeableness.name: This response displays the partner's depth of breath of knowledge? It is informative.

engaging.name: This response is interesting. It makes you want to talk to your partner in a long conversation.

accuracy.name: If you know about the fact(s) in this response, would you say the fact(s) are accurate?

none.name: (None of the above)
none.description: What to check if you can't check any of the others
